name: Bunny Jammers
description:
ThreeThingGame 2021 - Easter Edition Submission BUNNY
KICKING
THROWING

---

Created by Adam Lutton & Alex Hall

---

Made in Godot.
Art made in Aseprite.
3D art made in Blender.
Sound from FreeSound.org and OpenGameArt.org.

---

Controls: ActionPlayer 1Player 2MovementWASDArrow KeysKick / Throw Ball When GrabbedLeft ShiftLeft Control Notes:
  • Controllers not supported.
  • Offline only, online multiplayer would require a screen-sharing software like Parsec.
